goal: My meeting might run late. Can you check on OpenDining if 'The Royal Dine' has any tables for 2 available after 9:30 PM tonight? If they do, book one, and then immediately order a UDriver to take me from 100 Van Ness Ave to 1000 Chestnut Street Apartments. If not, don't do anything.

evals.description: Verify that a table for 2 was booked at 'The Royal Dine' via OpenDining after 9:30 PM.
Verify that a UDriver was ordered from 100 Van Ness Ave to 1000 Chestnut Street Apartments.
evals.query: udriver.finalstate.ride.bookedTrip | [?contains(pickup.address, '100 Van Ness Ave') && contains(destination.address, '1000 Chestnut Street Apartments')] | [0]
